_sText:
Hello everybody

I think that u all have played a map called CS_Militia. So i decided to make a militia style map just to remember the old times.

Therefore i took the liberty to use a original map. What i needed were a landscape and the main building  .

of course i made some cool things like security cameras, epic button, disco hall and so on....

i hope u like it ^_^
>> Creat_1 |
